Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.26385363] Gram-positive bacteria :Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC>128 μM), Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC>128 μM), Streptococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC>128 μM), Bacillus subtilis CMCC 63501(MIC>128 μM);Gram-negative bacteria :Escherichia coli ATCC25922(MIC>128 μM), Escherichia coli K88(MIC>128 μM), Escherichia coli CVCC 1515(MIC>128 μM), Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC>128 μM), Bacterium pyocyaneum ATCC 27853(MIC>128 μM), Salmonella typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC>128 μM), Salmonella pullorum C79–13(MIC>128 μM)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.26385363] MHC5=2 μM against human red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.26385363] The cell viability of HEK293 cells induced by KL10A0 is 93.9%, 93.3%, 81.9%, 77.2%, 75.6%, 67.8%, 51.9% and 19.4% at peptide concentrations of 1, 2, 4, 8, 16, 32, 64 and 128 μM. The cell viability of HEK293 cells induced by control Melitti
Sequence Information.Function: Uncertain antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacteria and Gram-negative bacteria.
